page.title: 04Farming in Inverarity
page.content: The land in this area is of a good quality but needs more drainage.Some of the fields have been drained but others have to use the deep ditches on each side of the road. The farmers plant a mixture of crops.The crops are spring barley,winter barley,turnips,potatoes, grass and oil seed rape which means there is lots of work at all seasons. The farmer has a mixture of animals.The main type of sheep is the Blackface.There are two kinds of cattle,the Hereford and the Fresian. The sheep are kept mostly for their wool and the cattle are kept to be fattened up and sold at the market in Forfar or Perth.
